name: NPR
text:
Online support groups for COVID-19 patients have become a target for the spread of misinformation. Experts say that not only misleads people â€” but can also undermine trust in science.

Now, some patients are working to fact-check their groups.

name: NPR
text:
Republican Sen. Ben Sasse lambasted President Trump for 8 minutes on a call with constituents, saying the president mishandled the pandemic, mistreats women and cozies up to dictators.

"His family has treated the presidency like a business opportunity."
https://t.co/Cflt9UITGo

name: NPR
text:
Protesters in Bangkok flashed the 3-finger Hunger Games salute as they taunted Thailand's king and queen during an "unprecedented" anti-government demonstration calling for the prime minister's resignation and curbs on the monarchy.
https://t.co/w42quFxAoJ

text:

text:
